decreaseRoboticonInventory() - Method in class com.mygdx.game.Player
Decrements the number of Roboticons owned by the player
decrement() - Method in class com.mygdx.game.GameTimer
Decrements the internal timer by 1 second upon being called
delay - Variable in class com.mygdx.game.SplashScreen
Variable storing the number of seconds over which the splash screen will hang
deployRoboticon() - Method in class com.mygdx.game.GameEngine
Deploys a Roboticon on the last tile to have been selected Draws a Roboticon from the active player's Roboticon count and assigns it to the tile in question
deployRoboticonButton - Variable in class com.mygdx.game.GameScreen
Button which allows players to deploy owned roboticons onto selected tiles
Description - Variable in class com.mygdx.game.College
The description of the College.
deselectTile() - Method in class com.mygdx.game.GameScreen
Run this to deselect the currently selected tile Specifically resets the labels and icons that identify the selected tile and disables the buttons for manipulating said tile (as no tile can be deemed as being "selected" after this is run)

dispose() - Method in class com.mygdx.game.GameScreen
Disposes of all visual data used to construct previous frames This is called after each frame is rendered, and remains necessary to prevent memory leaks
dispose() - Method in class com.mygdx.game.MainMenu
Disposes of all visual data used to construct previous frames This is called after each frame is rendered, and remains necessary to prevent memory leaks

Disposes of all visual data used to construct previous frames This is called after each frame is rendered, and remains necessary to prevent memory leaks
dispose() - Method in class com.mygdx.game.TTFont
Clears the object's internal font from memory
draw() - Method in class com.mygdx.game.Overlay
Draws every actor on the core stage (along with a complementary bordered background) on to the next frame in the game's rendering pipeline
drawBorder() - Method in class com.mygdx.game.Tile
Draws the tile's coloured border on the game's stage This must be called during the construction of each frame in which the border is to be shown Note that the border must only be shown if the tile is owned by someone

drawRectangles() - Method in class com.mygdx.game.GameScreen
Draw auxiliary rectangles to provide window-dressing for the interface
drawTooltip() - Method in class com.mygdx.game.Tile
Draws the tile's tooltip on the game's stage Specifically draws the tooltip region in the space to the top- or bottom-left of the cursor's position (depending on how high up the cursor is in the game's window) before drawing textual and visual contents inside that region This must be called during the construction of each frame in which the tooltip is to be shown
